snippet: The N.F.L. levied $50,000 in fines to the Pittsburgh Steelers and wide receiver Emmanuel Sanders for faking an injury in a game in Cincinnati.
abstract: NFL levies $50,000 in fines to Pittsburgh Steelers and wide receiver Emmanuel Sanders for faking an injury during game against Cincinnati Bengals; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. levied $50,000 in fines to the Pittsburgh Steelers and wide receiver Emmanuel Sanders for faking an injury in a game in Cincinnati.

headline.seo: N.F.L. Fines Steelers and Emmanuel Sanders for Faking Injury
headline.main: N.F.L. Fines Steelers and Sanders for Faking Injury
